flawed_nl_solution:
A pound of coffee makes 40 cups of coffee, so 3 lbs. coffee * 40 cups of coffee per lb. = <<3*40=210>>210 cups of coffee.
Angie drinks 3 cups of coffee a day, so she has enough coffee to last her 210 cups of coffee / 3 cups of coffee per day = <<210/3=70>>70 days
#### 70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
